title: Never executes: AUDIT_FINDINGS_BACKLOG.md backlog check
why_it_matters: Workflow checks for docs/AUDIT_FINDINGS_BACKLOG.md which doesn't exist (archived in TDMS Phase 2). The check always exits early with 0 items, making the entire job pointless. Script check-backlog-health.js also references this non-existent file.
suggested_fix: Remove backlog-health job from workflow or update to check docs/technical-debt/MASTER_DEBT.jsonl instead
acceptance_tests: OR job updated to check MASTER_DEBT.jsonl
description: Workflow checks for docs/AUDIT_FINDINGS_BACKLOG.md which doesn't exist (archived in TDMS Phase 2). The check always exits early with 0 items, making the entire job pointless. Script check-backlog-health.js also references this non-existent file.
recommendation: Remove backlog-health job from workflow or update to check docs/technical-debt/MASTER_DEBT.jsonl instead

title: Never executes: npm script test:coverage:report
why_it_matters: Script defined but never called in any workflow, hook, or automation. Only appears in audit documentation. Creates impression of functionality that doesn't execute.
suggested_fix: Remove script from package.json or add to CI workflow if coverage reporting is needed
description: Script defined but never called in any workflow, hook, or automation. Only appears in audit documentation. Creates impression of functionality that doesn't execute.
recommendation: Remove script from package.json or add to CI workflow if coverage reporting is needed

title: Never executes: npm script learning:category
why_it_matters: Script defined but never called in any workflow, hook, documentation, or automation. Likely vestigial from development.
description: Script defined but never called in any workflow, hook, documentation, or automation. Likely vestigial from development.

title: Never executes: npm script learning:since
why_it_matters: Script defined but only referenced in archived plan. Not called in any active workflow or automation.
description: Script defined but only referenced in archived plan. Not called in any active workflow or automation.

title: Never executes: npm script config:validate
why_it_matters: Inline script to validate JSON config files. Mentioned in DEVELOPMENT.md but never called in CI, pre-commit, or pre-push hooks. Manual-only scripts reduce reliability.
suggested_fix: Add to pre-commit hook when scripts/config/*.json files are modified, or remove if configs are stable
acceptance_tests: Added to .husky/pre-commit for config file changes
description: Inline script to validate JSON config files. Mentioned in DEVELOPMENT.md but never called in CI, pre-commit, or pre-push hooks. Manual-only scripts reduce reliability.
recommendation: Add to pre-commit hook when scripts/config/*.json files are modified, or remove if configs are stable

title: Never executes: npm script session:summary
why_it_matters: Script passes --summary flag to log-session-activity.js but is only documented, never automated. Manual-only logging reduces effectiveness.
suggested_fix: Remove script or add to session-end skill/workflow
description: Script passes --summary flag to log-session-activity.js but is only documented, never automated. Manual-only logging reduces effectiveness.
recommendation: Remove script or add to session-end skill/workflow

title: Never executes: npm script override:list
why_it_matters: Lists overrides logged by log-override.js but never called in automation. Only manual execution means oversight data is not reviewed systematically.
suggested_fix: Remove script or add to weekly/monthly automated review process
acceptance_tests: OR added to scheduled GitHub Action or session checkpoint
description: Lists overrides logged by log-override.js but never called in automation. Only manual execution means oversight data is not reviewed systematically.
recommendation: Remove script or add to weekly/monthly automated review process

title: Never executes: GitHub workflow master branch trigger
why_it_matters: Workflow configured to trigger on [main, master] but repo only has 'main' branch. The 'master' condition never fires, cluttering the trigger configuration.
suggested_fix: Remove 'master' from branches array, keep only 'main'
description: Workflow configured to trigger on [main, master] but repo only has 'main' branch. The 'master' condition never fires, cluttering the trigger configuration.
recommendation: Remove 'master' from branches array, keep only 'main'

title: Never executes: validate-plan workflow for archived file
why_it_matters: Workflow triggers only when docs/archive/completed-plans/INTEGRATED_IMPROVEMENT_PLAN.md changes. This file is archived and unlikely to be modified, making the entire workflow dormant.
suggested_fix: Archive/disable workflow or expand paths to include active plan documents
acceptance_tests: OR paths updated to include docs/plans/*.md
description: Workflow triggers only when docs/archive/completed-plans/INTEGRATED_IMPROVEMENT_PLAN.md changes. This file is archived and unlikely to be modified, making the entire workflow dormant.
recommendation: Archive/disable workflow or expand paths to include active plan documents
